long_description: If you love ski touring, winter trail runs or brisk urban walks, the versatile Mammut Amabilis soft-shell jacket is for you. It's wind and water resistant, breathable and stretchy for easy movement. Soft, super stretchy yet robust soft-shell fabric resists wind, sheds moisture and breathes during activity. Power-stretch fleece side and underarm panels and upper back inserts provide superior breathability and wicking, and enhance dynamic movement. Brimmed hood with a horizontal drawcord adjusts for a warm snug fit that retains visibility in all directions. Zip hand and chest pockets. Reverse-coil front zipper with internal wind flap; soft fleece chin guard; close-fitting power-stretch fleece cuffs; drawcord hem. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. The Mammut Amabilis jacket has a slim, athletic fit.
